# new web framework

**SIMPLE, SPEED, MVC**

The k web framework is very simple to use, it based on koa2 and run as fast as koa2, it bright a agile MVC to you.

## Install

**npm install k -g**

## Quick Use

```
$ k new appname
$ npm install
$ node index.js
```

then your first app world be run at [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000).
